metadata.title: CVE-2018-5207 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
When using an incomplete variable argument, Irssi before 1.0.6 may accessdata beyond the end of the string.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5207` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

irssi - 0.8.19-1ubuntu1.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: irssi package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.19-1ubuntu1.6').
